Functions¶

harrison_functions.utils.bio.plate_wells.draw_plate(position_obj, num_rows=8, num_cols=12, fillna=False)¶
Takes a dictionary with the following format:
{'A1': 2.1,
 'A2': 1.9, ...}
and converts it to a dataframe with the following structure:

1

2

…

‘A’

2.1

1.9

…

‘B’

…
